segments.text: I feel an overwhelming sense of worry as I watch the scene unfold before me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman’s focus on the plate seems so misplaced against the backdrop of running water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but think how reckless the children are being, and it makes my heart race.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is teetering on that stool, stretching for the cookie jar as if it’s some kind of treasure.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl stands by expectantly, almost like a little angel waiting for her reward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the reality of the situation is so much more alarming than their innocent game.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful, yet the kitchen feels like it’s on the verge of chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR
